description: This notification is generated when a user logs in.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cLogIn HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalUserName s EXAMPLE HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalSource s EXAMPLE

description: It represents the name of the logging user when login with authentication
otherwise login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalUserName

description: Login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalSource

description: This notification is generated when a user logs out.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cLogOut HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalUserName s EXAMPLE HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalSource s EXAMPLE

description: It represents the name of the logging user when login with authentication
otherwise login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalUserName

description: Login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalSource

description: This notification is generated when a user fails to log in
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cLogInAuthenFailure HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalUserName s EXAMPLE HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalSource s EXAMPLE HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalUserAuthFailureReason i 1

description: It represents the name of the logging user when login with authentication
otherwise login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalUserName

description: Login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalSource

description: The reason why a user failed to log in.
variables.name: HH3C-UI-MAN-MIB::hh3cTerminalUserAuthFailureReason
